definition: flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful

sentences.english: The butterflies flirted from flower to flower.
sentences.chinese: 蝴蝶在花丛中飞来飞去。

sentences.english: At first, they sing and dance, like butterflies among flowers.
sentences.chinese: 开始时，边唱边舞，表现蝴蝶飞舞于花丛之中。

sentences.english: Bees are humming [buzzing] around from flower to flower.
sentences.chinese: 蜜蜂在花丛中嗡嗡地飞来飞去。

sentences.english: You shall see Him smiling in flowers, then rising and waving His hands in trees.
sentences.chinese: 你们会看到他在花丛中微笑，又在树上挥手。

sentences.english: I am in the flowers that bloom.
sentences.chinese: 我在盛开的花丛中翩飞。

sentences.english: When man was unfallen, his God gave him the flowery bowers of Eden as his quiet resting places;
sentences.chinese: 人犯罪以前，上帝赐祂伊甸的花丛作他平静的安歇所。

sentences.english: The bees are buzzing about among the flowers.
sentences.chinese: 蜜蜂在花丛中嗡嗡作声。

sentences.english: Flowers were in full bloom. Butterflies were flying from flowers to flowers in the spring sunshine.
sentences.chinese: 花儿尽情绽放，蝴蝶在春日的花丛间欢快地飞舞。

sentences.english: In vain searched through the heather.
sentences.chinese: 徒劳地搜索于石南花丛中。

sentences.english: An indifferent to the moon in the flowers were gradually rising, more moods.
sentences.chinese: 一轮明月淡然的在花丛中冉冉升起，更显意境。

sentences.english: Chu Xianyan song, graceful, who find me your blue sky Flowers her resentment?
sentences.chinese: 楚弦燕曲，婉约中，谁又寻得见你碧落花丛的羞怨？

sentences.english: I snapped a small limb bristling with hot pink azaleas off the bush.
sentences.chinese: 我赶忙从花丛里折下了一枝满是鲜艳粉嫩的杜鹃。

sentences.english: The divine spark leaps from the finger of God to the finger of Adam. (A.
sentences.chinese: 那些非凡的火花丛上帝的指尖跳到了亚当的指尖。

sentences.english: The bees are flying into the flowers.
A waft of sweet-smelling fragrance blew over from the flower bush.
sentences.chinese: 一阵芬芳的气息从花丛中吹过来。

sentences.english: The bees were tempted the odors of the roses and were humming around them.
sentences.chinese: 蜜蜂被玫瑰的花香吸引围着花丛嗡嗡叫。

definition: fig. beautiful purples and brilliant reds (idiom); lit. beautiful flowers
to loiter (i.e. reluctant to leave)/to linger on
Shulin city in New Taipei City 新北市[Xin1 bei3 shi4], Taiwan
flourishing blossom/a mass of flowers/luxuriant flowers
